summary: Three estranged sisters reunite to care for their dying mother and old conflicts and secrets return to the surface.
cast: Molly Parker|Rebecca Jenkins|Stacy Smith|Marguerite McNeil|Elliot Page|Hollis McLaren|Emmy Alcorn|Joseph Rutten|Nicola Lipman|Jackie Torrens|Kevin Curran|Ashley MacIsaac|Heather Rankin|Linda Busby|Stephen Manuel|Jim Swansburg|Elissa Sursara
title: Marion Bridge
